meta.article_title: August 7, 2017 - Feet Parallel to Table is Usually a Backhand Stance

feet_parallel_to_table_is_usually_a_back.probleme: Incorrect ready stance for backhand attack
causes_communes: Players facing forehand side, not opponent

debutant.cues: Face opponent, feet parallel to expected contact point

erreurs_a_eviter: Pushing with backhand when expecting forehand
